pinfix.title: Pin Fixer
pinfix.description: Make map pins scale less dramatically with zoom level.
pinfix.enable.name: Enable
pinfix.minScale.name: Min Scale
pinfix.minScale.desc: The smallest scale for map pins (zoomed all the way out).
pinfix.maxScale.name: Max Scale
pinfix.maxScale.desc: The larges scale for map pins (zoomed all the way in).
pinfix.zoomFloor.name: Zoom Floor
pinfix.zoomFloor.desc: The pin scale won't change when zoomed out further than this.
pinfix.zoomCeil.name: Zoom Ceiling
pinfix.zoomCeil.desc: The pin scale won't change when zoomed in further than this.
